Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 116th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/19/2015...
Injured on 10/2/2015 with a Spasms Back, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/20/2016 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/25/2017 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to San Francisco on 7/15/2018 (Going to STL: 2B Michael Holgate, LF Micheal Dore, RF Donald Lamberth, P Brian Eppinger. Going to SF: 2B Maurice Sydnor, P Barry Sechrist, P
Lino Gonzalez, P Alfonso Rodriguez)...
9/11/2018: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $1,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Released by San Francisco on 6/10/2019...
